metadata.title: CVE-2024-1062 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: [a heap overflow leading to denail-of-servce while writing a value largerthan 256 chars (in log_entry_attr)]

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
